Sentencas: In this work, co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide was studied in a Topsoe Fuel Cell (TOFC (R)) 10-cell stack, containing three different types of Ni/yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrode supported solid oxide electrolysis cells with a footprint of 12x12cm.
Titulo: High Temperature Co-Electrolysis of Steam and CO2 in an SOC Stack: Performance and Durability

Sentencas: The stack was operated at 800 degrees C and -0.75Acm(-2) with 60% conversion for a period of 1,000h.
Titulo: High Temperature Co-Electrolysis of Steam and CO2 in an SOC Stack: Performance and Durability

Sentencas: One type of the cells showed no long term degradation but actually activation during the entire electrolysis period, while the other two types degraded.
Titulo: High Temperature Co-Electrolysis of Steam and CO2 in an SOC Stack: Performance and Durability

Sentencas: The performance and durability of the different cell types is discussed with respect to cell material composition and microstructure.
Titulo: High Temperature Co-Electrolysis of Steam and CO2 in an SOC Stack: Performance and Durability

Sentencas: The results of this study show that long term electrolysis is feasible without notable degradation at 800 degrees C and a current density of -0.75Acm(-2).
Titulo: High Temperature Co-Electrolysis of Steam and CO2 in an SOC Stack: Performance and Durability
